languages.text: "Разумеется. Я считаю, что поделом. Они давно смущали окружающих своими вольными высказываниями о собственных правах — неудивительно, что это позорное пятно стерли с лица Даргонуса".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Я считаю, что поделом. Они давно смущали окружающих своими вольными высказываниями о собственных правах — неудивительно, что это позорное пятно стерли с лица Даргонуса".

languages.text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Я считаю, что поделом. Они давно смущали окружающих своими вольными высказываниями о собственных правах — неудивительно, что это позорное пятно стерли с лица Даргонуса".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. I think they deserve it. They have been embarrassing everyone with their daring speeches about their rights for a long time. No wonder this stain of guilt was erased from Dargonus."
"Of course. I think they deserve it. They have been embarrassing everyone with their daring speeches about their rights for a long time. No wonder this stain of guilt was erased from Dargonus."
"Of course. I think they deserve it. They have been embarrassing everyone with brash speeches about their rights for a long time. No wonder this shameful stain was erased from Dargonus."
"Of course. I think they deserve it. They have been embarrassing everyone with brash speeches about their rights for a long time. No wonder this shameful stain was erased from Dargonus."

"Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

languages.text: “当然听说了，要我说，他们落得这样的下场，纯粹就是咎由自取。一直以来，他们都在蛮横地宣扬个人权利，难怪达戈努斯会把这个可耻的污点抹除。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: “当然听说了，要我说，他们落得这样的下场，纯粹就是咎由自取。一直以来，他们都在蛮横地宣扬个人权利，难怪达戈努斯会把这个可耻的污点抹除。”

languages.text: « Évidemment. Et si vous voulez mon avis, je dirais qu'ils ont enfin eu ce qu'ils méritaient. Depuis trop longtemps déjà ils semaient la discorde avec leurs impudentes revendications. Leur seule existence était un chancre sur la face de Dargonus, et c'est une bonne chose qu'ils aient été éradiqués. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment. Et si vous voulez mon avis, je dirais qu'ils ont enfin eu ce qu'ils méritaient. Depuis trop longtemps déjà ils semaient la discorde avec leurs impudentes revendications. Leur seule existence était un chancre sur la face de Dargonus, et c'est une bonne chose qu'ils aient été éradiqués. »

languages.text: 「もちろんです。私の考えを言いますが、彼らはついに報いを受けたと思います。自分たちの権利について声高に叫び、不和の種を撒き散らしてきたのです。彼らがダルゴナスの顔からこの恥ずべき汚点を消したことは、さして不思議なことではないです」
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです。私の考えを言いますが、彼らはついに報いを受けたと思います。自分たちの権利について声高に叫び、不和の種を撒き散らしてきたのです。彼らがダルゴナスの顔からこの恥ずべき汚点を消したことは、さして不思議なことではないです」

languages.text: «Claro. Y si me lo preguntas, diría que se lo tenían bien merecido. Estaban propagando la discordia con discursos sobre sus derechos. Con razón han purgado esa mancha de la faz de Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: «Claro. Y si me lo preguntas, diría que se lo tenían bien merecido. Estaban propagando la discordia con discursos sobre sus derechos. Con razón han purgado esa mancha de la faz de Dargonus».

languages.text: "Natürlich. Und würdet Ihr mich nach meiner Meinung fragen, ich würde sagen, sie haben endlich bekommen, was sie verdienen. Sie hatten mit ihren dreisten Reden über ihre eigenen Rechte lange genug Zwietracht gesät. Es ist kein Wunder, dass sie diesen Schandfleck vom Angesicht Dargonus' ausgelöscht haben."
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Und würdet Ihr mich nach meiner Meinung fragen, ich würde sagen, sie haben endlich bekommen, was sie verdienen. Sie hatten mit ihren dreisten Reden über ihre eigenen Rechte lange genug Zwietracht gesät. Es ist kein Wunder, dass sie diesen Schandfleck vom Angesicht Dargonus' ausgelöscht haben."

languages.text: "Duydum efendim. Fikrimi sorarsanız başlarına geleni hak ettiklerini düşünüyorum. Hakları konusundaki küstahça konuşmaları, herkesi rahatsız etti. Dargonus'un o haşerelerden kurtulması iyi oldu."
languages.original_text: "Of course. And if you were to ask my opinion, I would say they finally received their comeuppance. They had sown discord with their brash speeches about their own rights long enough. It is small wonder that they erased this shameful stain from the face of Dargonus."
